  • Constructor Details

    • Level

      public Level(GameObject[][] backgroundObjects, GameObject[][] movableObjects)
      The only constructor because backgroundObjects & movableObjects are required
      Parameters:
      backgroundObjects - the background of the level
      movableObjects - the boxes and the player

  • Method Details

    • draw

      public void draw(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext gc)
      Draw the background objects and the movable objects on it
      Parameters:

    • update

      public void update(Direction direction)
      Updates the level when a key is pressed
      Parameters:
      direction - determines in which direction the player moved
